verses.name: Numbers 21:16
verses.text: And from thence they went to Beer: that is the well whereof the Lord spake unto Moses, Gather the people together, and I will give them water.

verses.name: Numbers 21:17
verses.text: Then Israel sang this song, Spring up, O well; sing ye unto it:

verses.name: Numbers 21:18
verses.text: The princes digged the well, the nobles of the people digged it, by the direction of the lawgiver, with their staves. And from the wilderness they went to Mattanah:

verses.name: Numbers 21:19
verses.text: And from Mattanah to Nahaliel: and from Nahaliel to Bamoth:
